response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This item has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. It's not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Considering its exceptional features and durability, we believe its value exceeds $12,000. We are offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $15,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for superior craftsmanship. Please let us know if you would like to explore this opportunity further.", "product_price": 15000}
